General.Name: Pasinex Resources Limited
General.Description: Pasinex Resources Limited engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. It explores for zinc, lead, silver, and copper deposits. The company holds a 50% interest in the Pinargozu zinc mine; and the Akkaya property located in Adana Province, Turkey. It also holds an option to acquire 80% interest in the Gunman zinc exploration project in Nevada. Pasinex Resources Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 82 Richmond Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
